sentence.text: We chose to study UNCL-Sema3E rather than wild type sema3E because unlike full length sema3E, the major p61-Sema3E peptide that is produced by cleavage of sema3E with signal peptide processing like pro-protein convertases activates signal transduction mediated by the signal transduction receptor and can promote tumor metastasis in addition to its anti-angiogenic activity.
